thread.title: The Grammys haven't even started yet, but the stars are already dressed up for the pre-parties
thread.title_full: The Grammys haven't even started yet, but the stars are already dressed up for the pre-parties

author: Suchandrika Chakrabarti
title: The Grammys haven't even started yet, but the stars are already dressed up for the pre-parties
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Stars have been sashaying down the red carpet for pre-parties a day ahead of the 2017 Grammy Awards . 
With the likes of Adele, Beyonce, Lady Gaga and Katy Perry expected to attend, this year’s event promises to be teaming with headline-hogging, show-stopping looks. 
Certain fashion trends have been taking this year’s carpets by storm, but unlike some of the more conservative shows, the Grammys is the time for celebrities to pick out some of their more daring, sexy designs. 
Live From the Red Carpet: Grammy Awards, Sunday 12th February @ 11pm, & Fashion Police: Grammy Awards Wednesday 15th February @ 9pm on E!
